kiri sini wenath rasakaraka yoda sakas kala ayiskrim (himakirama) wenuwata deshiya sahal upayogikotagena nishpadanaya kala rayiskrim wisheshayak gannoruwa krushi pradarshanayedi janathawata handunwa di thibe.shri lankawe pradhanathama krushibhogaya lesa salakena sahal nishpadanaye wadidiyunuwath samaga athirikthayen wenath nishpadana handunwadima matha krushikarma departhamenthuwe paryeshana niladharini hemanthika jayawardhana mahathmiya pradhana karya mandalaya nawa ayiskrim wargaya handunwa di atha.sahalwalin kiri wisheshayak nipadawa eeta wenath deshiya rasakaraka sanyoga kota nipadawana rayis krim gunawath athurupasak lesath bhawitha kala haki athara eya nipadawa ganna kramaya pilibanda janathawa danuwath kirimath kadinamin sidukarana bawada jayawardhana mahathmiya pawasuwaya.meya wenath ayiskrim wargawalata wada rasayath gunayath anuna wana athara milen itha aduya.
